alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 8:06PM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the higher elevations with 1 to 3 inches expected in the lower elevations. * WHERE...Snowy and Sierra Madre Mountain Ranges, North Snowy Range Foothills including Arlington and Elk Mountain along Interstate 80 between Laramie and Rawlins. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range
